angstd.ui.views.view.manager
Interface ComponentManager<T extends AngstdData,C extends ViewComponent>

Type Parameters:
T - generic type for the backend data
C - generic type for the UI view component
All Superinterfaces:
ViewManager
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractComponentManager, DomainArrangementComponentManager
public interface ComponentManager<T extends AngstdData,C extends ViewComponent>
extends ViewManager

The ComponentManager interface is a manager which maps backend data to their UI ViewComponents. The actual Types are generic as long as the bakend data implements the AngstData and the UI component the ViewData interface.

The interface provides methods for requesting a view component based on a specified data object, such as DomainArrangement. The creation of the view components should be performed by the implementing manager classes.

The basic implementation for this interface is AbstractComponentManager and specific implementation can extend this manager to add functionalities.

The ViewManager interface is extended to ensure the communication with the observed view.

Author:
Andreas Held
